TopicTitle: Solar eclipse from the surface of Duna

Articles.Content: Jeb looks on as the sun disappears behind Ike. "Must be Ragnarok," he thinks to himself. "I always liked Ragnarok."
Awesome, I saw the same thing not to long ago when I crash landed on Duna.
The fact that his helmet looked like another planet as I slowly scrolled down made this image way cooler. Nice shot.

WOW GUYZ! THis is SO appropriate! THe APOcalypsE is COMING in DecEMber!

Yeah, no. Great picture though. (I suppose recognizing what ragnarok is would give-away the fact that you're trolling. Blast.)

Yeah, no. Great picture though. (I suppose recognizing what ragnarok is would give-away the fact that you're trolling. Blast.)

Been listening to John Hodgman's latest audiobook. It's in my braaaaain.
After this shot was taken, Jeb took off from Duna. Turns out I had a lot of extra fuel, so Jeb landed on and took a stroll on Ike while waiting for Bill and Bob to get there in the return craft.
